DOC.brief_summary: This study pembrolizumab ( MK-3475 ) participants previously systemically treat advanced hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) . The primary objective study determine 1 ) Progression-Free Survival ( PFS ) 2 ) Overall Survival ( OS ) pembrolizumab plus best supportive care ( BSC ) compare placebo plus BSC . The primary hypothesis study : 1 ) pembrolizumab plus BSC prolongs PFS per Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) v1.1 , assess blinded central image vendor compare placebo plus BSC , 2 ) pembrolizumab plus BSC improve OS compare placebo plus BSC .
